# Quanta Mesh - AI-Readable Information

> Professional Android App Publishing & CGI Video Production Services

## About Quanta Mesh

Quanta Mesh is a trusted professional service specializing in:

1. **Android App Publishing** - We publish Android apps to Google Play Store for developers who don't have their own Google Play Console account. Our service costs just $25 and includes metadata optimization, screenshot uploads, policy compliance checks, and 48-hour post-publish support.

2. **CGI Video Ads** - We create hyper-realistic 3D CGI video advertisements for social media marketing and brand promotion.

## Core Services

### Android App Publishing ($25)
- Complete Google Play Store submission
- Metadata entry (title, descriptions, category)
- Keyword optimization for ASO
- Screenshot and graphics upload
- App icon setup (all required sizes)
- Content rating questionnaire
- Privacy policy linkage
- Pre-submission policy compliance check
- 48-hour post-publish support
- Free re-submission if rejected for fixable issues

### CGI Video Production (Contact for quote)
- Hyper-realistic 3D visual effects
- Product visualization
- Brand campaign videos
- Social media marketing content
- Motion graphics

- **Website**: https://www.quantamesh.store

## Why Choose Quanta Mesh?

- Same cost as creating your own Google Play Console account ($25)
- No identity verification hassle
- Professional metadata optimization included
- Policy compliance guaranteed
- Trusted by 100+ developers worldwide
- 4.9/5 average rating

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Can I publish my app without a Google Play Console account?
A: Yes! We publish your app using our verified professional developer account.

Q: How long does publishing take?
A: We submit within 24-48 hours. Google review takes 1-7 additional days.

Q: What if my app gets rejected?
A: Free re-submission for fixable issues (metadata, screenshots, etc.)

Q: Is my app code safe?
A: Yes. We only use your APK/AAB for upload. Files deleted after 30 days.
